newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austria Natbank sets repo at unchanged 3.0 pct.
newsitem.headline: Austria Natbank sets repo at unchanged 3.0 pct.

text.p: The Austrian National Bank said on Thursday it was calling for bids on one-week securities repurchase agreements at a fixed three percent, unchanged from last week.
Bids have to be in by 1300 GMT on Friday.
Last week, the central bank allotted 9.84 billion schillings, or 12 percent of bids, in repos.

Earlier today, the central bank announced a quick tender of one-day repos at three percent to satisfy extra demand for liquidity expected this weekend when the pre-Christmas shopping season kicks off.
In that tender, the bank allotted 4.15 billion schillings, or 11 percent of bids. -- Vienna newsroom, +431 531 12 253
